Weapon.Name: Echoes of the Forgotten
Weapon.Description: A blade that whispers tales of ancient battles and long-lost warriors.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Grants the ability to unleash a spectral warrior to assist in battle for 10 seconds.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As you swing the blade, echoes of past warriors fill the air, bolstering your strength.

Weapon.Name: Starfire Wand
Weapon.Description: A slender wand imbued with the essence of celestial bodies, warm to the touch.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Casts a radiant beam of light, causing extended damage over time.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With a flick, a brilliant beam of starfire erupts, searing your foes.

Weapon.Name: Whispers of the Void
Weapon.Description: A bow crafted from the essence of the void, absorbing light around it.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Arrows silence the target, preventing spellcasting for a brief period.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The arrow vanishes into shadow as it flies, striking with a muted thud.
